text: Ulac u$ilif fellawen, ma tennam d a pxevbem tilawin, ne$ ma teffrem. Iéôa Öebbi, ar tesmektayem tent id. Maca, ur asent âahdet, di tbavnit, siwa ma tennam awal uwqim. Ur ferrut $ef lemlak, alamma ibbwev lajel iuran. Cfut ar Öebbi Iéôa i illan degwen. Ëadret iman nnwen segS. Cfut ar Öebbi Ipsemmiê, Iêellem.
